title: How to install Windows with no Internet - Quora

response.answer_text: You will need to have some kind of media with the Windows Installation on it. Usually you can create this on 8GB USB Memory Stick and a Windows computer with Internet connection https://support.microsoft.com/en-au/help/15088/windows-create-installation-media You can then use the USB to install Windows on the computer that has no internet ability. The problem will come when you need to activate your copy of Windows. You will need a valid licence key and you can use the phone activation method. Activate Windows 10

Windows 10 can be installed without having access to the Internet  load your windows 10 installation file onto a pen drive.Open the Start menu.Click the power icon and restart the systemPress and hold Del or F2 to enter setup.Navigate to the Boot tab.select a device from which to bootPress the + key until your boot option is first.Save your settingsWait for your computer to restart.
